textfield.text: Lighting control device that detects occupancy of a space by people and turns the lights on or off automatically Typically used to save energy, provide automatic control, and comply with building codes
Automation of the home, housework or household activity Provides improved convenience, comfort, energy efficiency and security
Smart Grid Compatible Control of Appliances using Internet Protocol
Prachet Verma 1BY09EE028 Prahlad Suresh 1BY09EE030 Sarath Vadakkepat 1BY09EE044 Under the guidance of Prof. H. D. Kattimani

Electrical grid that uses information and communications technology to gather and act on information Improves the efficiency, reliability, economics, and sustainability of the production and distribution of electricity

Custom-designed board to duplicate the pins of the Raspberry Pi Provides accessibility and customisability to the project SCSI (Small Computer System Interface) cable used to replicate all the Raspberry Pi pins on to the extension board
To pull the output of switch to ground when the switch is in off state To limit the input current to the Raspberry Pi to below 5 mA
Rated 1000mA Step-down transformer 220V AC to 12-0-12V AC

To promote energy saving by implementing automatic switch off based on detected occupancy To comply with smart grid initiatives by enabling smart monitoring of usage of electricity To integrate luxury with necessity To make it available to the general public through intelligent design
Simple tact switches (only on when the button is pressed) Output is high when the switch is in on state, floating when the switch is in off state
Triac-based relay with BTB04-600SL IC Rated for 4A/250V AC input Input logic is 12V level Interfaced with MOC3041 for opto-isolation
700 Mhz CPU ARM-11 Family Videocore 4 GPU 512 MB RAM 24 GFLOPS
Input voltage of 12-0-12V AC output Output voltages of +5, +12, -5 and -12 V DC

To design a range-unbounded home automation system To enable control and monitoring of appliances over the internet instead of only locally To detect occupancy of a given area via means of a web camera only To accurately detect humans and other subjects of interest as per requirement using only the web camera and intelligent algorithms
Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
Developing a system to control appliances remotely using the Internet.

textfield.text: Mobile Phone is the remote Smart Occupancy Sensor
